headline: US Stock Market Today: S&P 500 Futures Dip Amid Cooling Jobs, Resilient Services Signals
summary: The Morning Bull - US Market Morning Update Thursday, Dec, 4 2025 US stock futures are edging slightly lower this morning as investors juggle two big signals: a cooling job market and still resilient service sector activity. Private payrolls fell by 32,000 in November, the biggest drop since 2023, which strengthens the case for interest rate cuts and helps explain why the key 10 year government borrowing cost has slipped toward 4.05 percent. At the same time, fresh readings on services...
